trans-unit.source: Specifies the visual state of a scroll bar that is drawn with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 指定以视觉样式绘制滚动条的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the following classes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical> The ScrollBarState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> class methods that draw the scroll bar track, scroll box (also known as the thumb), and scroll box grip.
trans-unit.target: ScrollBarState 值对应于为的状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>由以下类公开的对象:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical>ScrollBarState 值还用作中的自变量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>类绘制滚动条轨道、 滚动框 （也称为滚动块） 和滚动框手柄的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>

trans-unit.source: The scroll bar element is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条元素处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: The scroll bar element is hot.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条元素处于高温状态。

trans-unit.source: The scroll bar element is normal.
The scroll bar element is pressed.
